name: colcon-helper
description: Adds tasks that are specific to colcon workspaces

colcon.provideTasks.description: Determine whether extension should provide colcon tasks for workspace or not.

colcon.env.description: Path to file where colcon environment variables are listed. This file is auto-generated.

colcon.globalSetup.description: List of paths setup files of workspaces that is common among all of your repositories, like ROS's `setup.sh`.

colcon.workspaceSetup.description: List of paths to colcon workspaces files. You may list any number of workspaces as well as arbitrary files you want to source, like `~/.bashrc`.

colcon.workspaceDir.description: Folder, in which colcon commands are launched.

colcon.refreshOnStart.description: Refresh colcon modules configuration on application start.

colcon.refreshOnTasksOpened.description: Refresh colcon modules configuration on tasks request.

colcon.refreshOnConfigurationChanged.description: Refresh colcon modules configuration if Colcon Helper configuration is changed. It is still possible to update environment on command run.

colcon.outputLog.description: Print debug messages to extension log. If false, outputLevel property is ignored.

enumDescriptions: All messages, including common information and debug messages

colcon.buildArgs.description: Arguments that are passed to colcon build command.

colcon.testArgs.description: Arguments that are passed to colcon test command.

colcon.testResultArgs.description: Arguments that are passed to colcon test-result command.

colcon.cleanCommand.description: Command that is used to clean workspace.

colcon.cleanArgs.description: Arguments that are passed to clean command.

colcon.runCommand.description: Command that is used to launch project.

colcon.runArgs.description: Arguments that are passed to run command.

colcon.runFile.description: File that is launched by run command (passed after `runArgs`)

colcon.runFileArgs.description: Arguments that are passed to file in run command (passed after `runFile`).
